statements: SELECT * FROM RecruitmentData;
SELECT candidate_name, job_title FROM RecruitmentData WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT candidate_name, application_date, status FROM RecruitmentData WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT hiring_manager, COUNT(*) AS total_candidates FROM RecruitmentData GROUP BY hiring_manager;
SELECT job_title, interview_date FROM RecruitmentData WHERE application_source = 'Referral' ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecruitmentData WHERE status = 'Interview Scheduled';
SELECT candidate_name, job_title, interview_date FROM RecruitmentData WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, hiring_manager, application_source FROM RecruitmentData WHERE job_title LIKE '%Engineer%' ORDER BY application_date;
SELECT candidate_name, status FROM RecruitmentData WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT hiring_manager, COUNT(candidate_id) AS total_candidates FROM RecruitmentData GROUP BY hiring_manager HAVING total_candidates > 3 ORDER BY total_candidates DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecruitmentData;
SELECT candidate_name, job_title FROM RecruitmentData WHERE recruitment_stage='Final Interview';
SELECT candidate_name, job_title, interview_date FROM RecruitmentData ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT recruitment_stage FROM RecruitmentData;
SELECT candidate_name, overall_rating FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE overall_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM RecruitmentData WHERE recruitment_stage='Screening';
SELECT candidate_name, job_title, application_date FROM RecruitmentData WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT candidate_name, interview_date, feedback_text FROM RecruitmentData JOIN InterviewFeedback ON RecruitmentData.candidate_name = InterviewFeedback.candidate_name WHERE overall_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM RecruitmentData WHERE job_title='Software Engineer' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, job_title, recruitment_stage FROM RecruitmentData WHERE recruitment_stage='Final Interview' AND application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data;
SELECT candidate_name, application_status FROM recruitment_data WHERE application_status='Pending';
SELECT candidate_id, job_title, application_date FROM recruitment_data ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, feedback_date, overall_rating FROM hiring_feedback WHERE overall_rating > 3;
SELECT interview_id, interviewer_name, interview_result FROM interview_schedule WHERE interview_result='Accepted';
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data WHERE application_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, job_title, application_status FROM recruitment_data WHERE application_status = 'Approved' AND job_title LIKE '%Engineer%' ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;

SELECT candidate_name, application_date, job_title, application_status FROM recruitment_data JOIN interview_schedule ON recruitment_data.candidate_id = interview_schedule.candidate_id WHERE interview_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT candidate_name, feedback_date, feedback_notes FROM recruitment_data JOIN hiring_feedback ON recruitment_data.candidate_id = hiring_feedback.candidate_id WHERE overall_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;

SELECT RD.candidate_name, IS.interview_date, HF.feedback_date FROM recruitment_data RD JOIN interview_schedule IS ON RD.candidate_id = IS.candidate_id JOIN hiring_feedback HF ON RD.candidate_id = HF.candidate_id WHERE IS.interview_result = 'Pass' AND HF.overall_rating > 3 ORDER BY IS.interview_date ASC, HF.feedback_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date, feedback FROM RecruitmentData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE feedback_given_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date, interview_date FROM RecruitmentData WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interviewer_name, interview_date, interview_duration FROM InterviewSchedule WHERE interview_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT year, hiring_rate, retention_rate FROM RecruitmentMetrics WHERE hiring_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM RecruitmentData ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date, interview_date, feedback FROM RecruitmentData WHERE interview_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT applicant_name, interview_date, feedback_details FROM RecruitmentData JOIN InterviewFeedback ON RecruitmentData.id = InterviewFeedback.applicant_id;
SELECT interviewer_name, interview_duration, feedback_details FROM InterviewSchedule JOIN InterviewFeedback ON InterviewSchedule.feedback_id = InterviewFeedback.id;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date, feedback_details FROM RecruitmentData JOIN InterviewFeedback ON RecruitmentData.id = InterviewFeedback.applicant_id ORDER BY application_date;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data;
SELECT candidate_name, job_title FROM recruitment_data ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT job_title, department, location FROM job_openings WHERE experience_required > 3;
SELECT candidate_name, proficiency_level FROM candidate_skills WHERE experience_years >= 2;
SELECT * FROM interview_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, interview_date;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data WHERE interview_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT candidate_name, job_title, application_date FROM recruitment_data ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM job_openings;
SELECT candidate_name, proficiency_level, certification FROM recruitment_data JOIN candidate_skills ON recruitment_data.id = candidate_skills.candidate_id;
SELECT team_lead_name, COUNT(*) AS team_size_count FROM hiring_team GROUP BY team_lead_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
